attributes.action: NOT revise the Governments plans to recognise polygamous marriage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to NOT revise the Governments plans to recognise polygamous marriage.

 polygamous marriage , not only does this go against all Traditional, Cultural and Religious values of Great Britain, it will also place a very  unjust burden on the British Tax payer who will have to foot the bill for Housing and other Benefits claimed. polygamous marriage should not be recognised.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
